00039     \brief Generate a block of silent audio samples.

00061 /*! Alter the period of a silence generator context by a specified amount.
00062     \brief Alter the period of a silence generator context by a specified amount.
00063     \param s The silence generator context.

00067 */
00068 SPAN_DECLARE(void) silence_gen_alter(silence_gen_state_t *s, int silent_samples);
